title.en: Danna-sama wa Elite Gekai - Karisome Fuufu na no ni Dekiaisaretemasu

altTitles.ja: 旦那様はエリート外科医〜かりそめ夫婦なのに溺愛されてます〜

altTitles.ja-ro: Danna-sama wa Elite Gekai - Karisome Fuufu na no ni Dekiaisaretemasu

description.en:
I may only be his wife in form, but I want to stay by his side.

A contract marriage with everyone's favorite surgeon on the first day of their relationship? 
On the day of a reception at the hospital, a new nurse, Minaori, is asked by Dr. Mayuzumi, whom she secretly admires, to marry her by contract. He confesses that he is about to get involved in a power struggle at the hospital because he is single. She wants to support his desire to help as many patients as possible, but she refuses, saying that marriage is not an option for her. They are supposed to be a temporary couple, but his thoughtfulness and the gradual closing of the distance between the two of them confuse her, but she can't stop herself from having a crush on him.....
